message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by its previous owners. Given its quality and functionality, it's worth more than $100 to many users. Considering its value and the fact that it would be a great addition to your collection, I am offering it to you for $115. This price reflects its true worth while allowing me to earn a fair profit. I believe this is a mutually beneficial deal, and I look forward to your positive response.
